item.title: How to Create a Self-Hosted Azure DevOps Agent using Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets
item.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up a self-hosted Azure DevOps agent pool using Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets (VMSS) with scaling, screenshots, and security best practices.
